MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-OCT-2020 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the TD5 and TD8 postcode areas of Kelso and Jedburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.31pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our network at Hownam Village and our team are on site investigating the fault and are working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.32pm on Tuesday 20th October 2020.
